Executive Summary

I am a highly self-motivated and intellectually curious individual with a strong interest in exploring machine learning and deep learning applications across diverse domains. As a Research Assistant, my primary focus has been on applying Artificial Intelligence to medical applications, leveraging techniques in machine learning, deep learning, computer vision, and image processing. In addition to my technical expertise, I excel in communication. I have presented my research at several international conferences and have earned recognition through multiple competition wins. I am eager to pursue a Master's program where I can further engage in multidisciplinary research at the intersection of Artificial Intelligence and Information Technology, while continuing to share my work with the broader academic and professional community.

Experiences

AI-Based Projects

Anxiety Disorder Detection from fNIRS

National Cheng Kung University

06/2023 - Present
  • Developing algorithms using machine learning and deep learning to classify healthy and anxiety subjects based on Functional Near Infrared Spectroscopy (fNIRS) signals.
  • Presenting the research outcomes at the Eurasian Conference on Educational Innovation (ECEI-2025).

Syringe Volume Recognition System

National Cheng Kung University

06/2023 - 12/2025
  • Developing an automatic syringe detection using YOLOv8 to automate task of extract ROI from five different syringe types (1ml, 3ml, 10ml, 30ml, and 50ml).
  • Designing an automatic volume recognition system based on the number of lines in the syringe using image processing techniques: Thresholding, Morphological Transformation, and Contour Detection using OpenCV.
  • Presenting the research outcomes at several international conferences: ICAISP-2024, ICBHI-2024, and SEMBA-2025.
  • Published research paper in conference proceedings, DOI: 10.1007/978-3-031-86323-3_30.
Technical Skills: YOLOv8, OpenCV, Image Processing, Computer Vision, Python, Deep Learning

BERT Hate Speech Classification

Bachelor's Project - NCKU

08/2019 - 06/2023
  • Classifying hate speech from Davidson Dataset using Natural Language Processing techniques and deploying in web-based environment under Hugging Face.
  • Collaborative project with PhD from the Geomatics and Information Management Department at NCKU, supervised by Professor Eric Hsueh-Chan Lu.
Technical Skills: BERT, NLP, Transformers, Hugging Face, Python, Deep Learning

COVID-19 Chest X-Ray Classification

Bachelor's Project - NCKU

08/2019 - 06/2023
  • Using U-Net to automate image segmentation task of chest x-ray images and creating a downloadable GUI software to classify between Normal vs. COVID-19 vs. Pneumonia Chest X-Ray images.
  • Utilizing data augmentation and transfer learning technique using ResNet101 model to improve model accuracy up to 97%.
  • View project on GitHub.
Technical Skills: U-Net, ResNet101, Transfer Learning, Image Segmentation, Python, TensorFlow
